Array.Value: A place to keep various items. A lot could be stored with its large capacity.
A place to cultivate edible grains. Cultivation takes time and water.
A block of hardened dirt. A bit artificial, but great to walk on.
A simple ladder made of fiber. A little hard to climb up and down.
A place to hire a miner to mine with expertise.
A place to process various rocks. A fine stone carving can only done here.
A place to bake bread and cakes. This will need a lot of grain power.
A place to hire a maintenance worker to fix the damaged city structures.
A place to hire an expert to cut trees. Anything in tree shape can be cut down.
A place to process logs. Produces lumber and sticks.
A place to cultivate edible berries. Cultivation takes nutrients and water.
A personal bed for a ratizen to rest. Can lay an emergency patient on it too.
A place to drink and have secret talks. Still a no good without beer.
A place to empty bowels and wash hands. Let's have a National Washed Hands week.
A place to provide a great show. People need circus to live on.
A strong door made of woods. Make a rule for whom to pass around.
A place to accept new migrants. Think carefully on whom to accept.
A place to wash and take a warm bath. Feels like even the minds got purified.
A structure to properly collect taxes. With tax collectors, impossible is nothing.
A place to grow edible mushrooms. Cultivation takes nutrients and time.
A place to educate ratizens better. Surprisingly, it is a quite enjoyable place.
A place to provide enjoyable paintings. For the services, some dyes are needed.
A facility to forge ingots to produce items. Produces various items made of metal.
A place to cut and trim ratizens' hairs. Clean hairs are beautiful and sanitary.
A place to wash the customer's clothes. Cleanliess keeps body safe from germs.
A place to brew drinks. Produces cool beers and aromatic wines.
A place to manufacture coins by metals. Appropriate money supply is crucial.
A small workshop for dexterous citizens. Produces various necessities.
A place to hunt down wild animals. Beware of becoming the prey
A place to process captured animals. Produces meat, bones, and leathers.
A military facility to train melee soldiers. Sufficient training is needed before battle.
A place to make items with dirt and logs. Produces pots and charcoals.
A place to cure the wounded and sick. Heals the injured or wounded visitors.
A place to process woods into items. Produces tools, barrels, and gears.
A place to process leathers into items. Produces bags, shoes, and parchments.
A place to breed rabbits and harvest milk. Breeding needs enough feedstuffs.
A place to gather water nearby. Beware, the city consumes a lot of water.
A place to extract colors from flowers. Produces various colors of dyes.
A place to enjoy watching bloody fight. Might get tired without knowing.
A place to forage for materials. Anything grass-shaped can be gathered.
A place to grind anything needed. The products varies with the ingredients.
A place to cook various roasted foods. Cooking needs a bit of salt and recipe.
A place to produce books. Anything writable could become a book.
A place to process fibers into items. Produces fabric, rope, and silk.
A structure to trade with other cities for foreign currency or items needed.
A block of tough wood made of lumber. A bit creaking, but still reliable.
A place to discover new inventions. Great efforts are needed from the intelligent.
A place to transport items. Importance of the logistics distribution!
A block of hard and heavy rock. Seems anything could be blocked with it.
A station where Ratizens can use minecart to move quickly.
A rail that can be used to move faster. Let's make a great railway empire.
A post to shot arrows to the enemies. Feels quite safe in it.
A wooden bench to relax. Have a look around once in a while.
A Fountain designed to fit jungle view. Peaceful water sounds relaxing.
A Streetlight designed to fit jungle view. Comfortable light shines as in the woods.
A facility to produce variable medications. Bat power and immortality are not dreams.
A monument of national foundation day. Long live the Queen.
A structure to craft gemstones into jewels. Delicate craftsmanship enhances brilliance.
A place to provide soothing massage. It always feels strangely relaxing.
A place for a great talent to perform. Power of culture!
A place to keep the bees safe to grow. Produces honey and wax.
A place to process metal ores into ingots. Produces metal ingots and glass.
A place to process glass into products. Produces bottles and ornaments.
A social place to enjoy drinks and snacks. Any intrigues are kept secret here.
A place to grow silkworms safe. Their cocoons are used to make silk.
A place to grow bats safe. A mumane way is used to extract juice.
A roof made of leaves to keep below dry. Might be safe to run around above.
A ladder made of wooden sticks. Much easier to climb up and down.
A place to process fibers to make items. Produces cloths from fabric and silk.
Shrine dedicated for sacred dog. By the power of dog, skills can be used.
Shrine dedicated for sacred rat. By the power of rat, skills can be used.
Well designed comfortable bed. Specially designed for the royal families.
A place to record all in the kingdom. Statistics can be checked and controlled.
A place to grow grasses. Even a mere weed needs water and dirts.
A place to grow flowers. Even a wild flower needs water and dirts.
A military facility to train marksrat. Sufficient training is needed before battle.
A place to group soldiers to follow orders. They will follow the orders of the leader.
A huge stone to announce new laws. All the laws as tax, commercial, and welfare can be set.
A shadowy place to get great joy. Wonder what is happening deep in there?
A fountain with exquisite beauty. Pure water flows vigorously.
A streetlight carved with woods. A soft light glows without a noise.
A bench with exquisite beauty. Cold touch of stone feels great.
A bench with the shape of a rat head. Head shape should be wierd but somehow cute.
A bench structured without nails. Solid but soft touch feels great.
A streetlight with exquisite beauty. Decorated excellent with metals.
A fountain replicating a natural fall. Flows aloof as in the mountains.
A Bench designed to fit jungle view. Feels like sitting on a branch of a tree.
A substantial block made of carved stone. Neat and exquisite.
A place to keep various items. Not much can be stored due to its size.
A place to exchange and get a loan. High tech capital facility with great safety.
A place to lay a dead ratizen. Prevents a possible epidemic.
A place to lay the deads. Makes anyone who passes a bit reverent.
A roof made of slates to keep below dry. Has distinct patterns.
A dark colored block made of slate. Give some elegance style to the city.
A strong barricade made of wood. This will hold enemies for great time.
A place to fish some fishes. It is really important to find right spot.
Trap that senses and pierces enemies. Beware not to be pierced with enemies.
A strengthened gate forged with iron. Feels much safer than wooden gate.
Trap that senses and pushes enemies. Beware not to be pushed with enemies.
Trap that spouts bees to enemies. Bees are fearless, making them perilous.
A huge stone smashing what is below. Beware not to be smashed with enemies.
Barricade reinforced with explosives. Be careful not to get caught in the middle.
A wallpaper decorated with dirt. Feels cozy like underground den.
A wallpaper decorated with lumber. Feels relaxed and calm like in the tree.
A facility that collects sap from nearby trees. Various saps have different purposes.
A military facility to train forest keepers. Foresters use various forestal abilities.
Shrine dedicated for sacred ox. By the power of ox, skill can be used.
A forge solely for the leader of the city. Let's make equipments for I, the leader!
Allows Ratizens to take a lift in between, when connected by lift ropes to the other stations
Cable to vertically connect the stations. When fully connected, lift can be used.
A small picture to decorate places. Quite beautiful picture to be placed.
A medium picture to decorate places. Master piece of some artists.
A large picture to decorate places. A true piece of art.
An academy to train the masters of battle. Trainings will take time and resources.
A bed for two. This will save a lot of spaces.
Barricade reinforced with spike. Sharp thorns will pay back to enemies.
A camp for basic military training. Trained ones are stronger than civilians.
A delicate small sculpture. Some call this a classic.
A delicate medium-sized sculpture. Some call this a masterpiece.
A desk with tools to do some research. Let's check new structures for the city!
A Fountain shaped as huge tree. Reproduces water dropping from leaves.
Natural tree themed wallpaper with coziness. Surface is a bit rough, but quite reliable.
Crude ladders made by weasels. Built with their prey's hard bones.
A structure to interact with discovered cities. There are no eternal enemies or allies.
A facility for maintaining local security. It apprehends criminals and rehabilitates them.
A facility where criminals can be confined. Let's make a wise choice for the health of the city.
An advanced bed specialized for health recovery. It's soft and comfortable to lie down on.
Plate to carve in the names of the ratizens. Who are written can be separated as group.
A mailbox to give orders from distance. Structures near the mailbox can be managed.
Crude block made by weasels. Built with their prey's hard bones.
Crude palace made by weasels. Unknown threat is waiting inside.
A prominent flag with the symbol of the kingdom. Let's proudly set it up to represent the nation's pride.
A prominent flag with the symbol of the kingdom. Conveniently modified to hang on the ceiling.
A structure to grow fish with grain power, providing a stable supply of plump, well-fed fish.
A soft, luxury bed designed with a focus on rest, ensuring a deep sleep to anyone who lies.
A post to cultivate plants in wildlife. Cultivated plants grow faster than the others.
A place to craft various scents. Produces items that exude pleasant aromas.
A repaired abandoned mine where Nocslin can be harvested. Assign a specialist to mine it safely.
A small garden to cultivate diverse plants. Plants with small sizes can be planted.
A functional spiderweb to collect dew. Gathered dew forms water drop and falls.
A bell to alert all the ratizens in the city. Might be stressful, but sometimes it is needed.
A facility where teeth are taken care of using hermit crab. It's good for both sponges and rats.
A large garden to cultivate diverse plants. Tree-sized plants can be planted.
A small statue made with carved stone.
A piece of art made with dense snow.
A small space solely for flowers.
Base part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
Middle part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
Top part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
An ornamental fish tank. Feel at ease watching the leisurely swimming fish.
A spike trap coated in poison. Even a slight touch can be dangerous.
A track to watch racing snails. They are slow, but surprisingly exciting.
A hygiene facility using frogs to eliminate fleas. It might sting a bit, but it's better than itching.
Soft wallpaper made by weaving grass leaves.
Solid wallpaper with a natural rock feel.
Crunchy wallpaper with a dry feel.
Wall with a deep forest feel made from vines.
A decorative item where equipment can be placed.
Decorative item utilizing an ordinary wooden box.
Decorative item made by stacking overflowing gold.
Decorative item that looks like something is inside.
Decorative item made using food. No pranks were played.
A symbol of peace representing victory. Weasels are no longer the arch nemesis.
A crematory that can burn anything. Beware, what is burned never comes back.
A torch made to hang from the ceiling.
An outstanding throne made of wood. As I sit here, you all shall obey.
A beautiful throne made of stone. As I sit here, gazing upon all, you all shall obey.
A flowerpot made to hang from the ceiling.
A decorative item where various tools can be placed.
Top part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
Top part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
A device to drop a bundle of spiderwebs. Spreads when hit, making all difficult to move.
A wallpaper decorated with Ice. Provides coziness as if in an igloo.
A transparent wallpaper. Removes the placed wallpaper.
A tree filled with the spirit of peace and love. Embodies the hope for everyone's happiness.
A table with suitable height to eat foods. Ratizens will be happier this way.
A device for viewing distant places. Allows to observe the Ratizens' natural behaviors.
A tunnel station using secret passages. It costs money, but allows easy travel through connected tunnels.
A structure for changing the leader's clothes. What should I wear today?
A structure that generates electricity using wind power. Requires wide space for optimal efficiency.
A structure used for storing or supplying electricity. Reduced size with increased capacity.
A device to monitor citizens' daily tasks. Makes hard work unavoidable, whether liked or not.
A device that waters plants to boost production. No need to manually tend to plants anymore.
Connects generators to storage facilities. Might seem risky, but doesn't obstruct passage.
Connects generators to storage through walls. Incorporates wires into walls to minimize obstruction.
A structure that produces electricity using water flow. Difficult to maintain efficiency, but generates a significant amount of power.
A device that sprays medicinal powder on passing Ratizens. Not incredibly powerful, but still provides a feeling of improved health.
A device that generates electricity using sunlight. Only operates during the day but is eco-friendly.
A device that uses electricity to illuminate the surroundings. Bright lighting makes the path clearly visible.
A structure that generates electricity using high heat. Boasts quite high efficiency.
A structure to recharge Ratrons' energy. Place strategically to prevent Ratrons from collapsing.
A structure that connects distant power networks. A miraculous technology that transmits electricity wirelessly!
A facility for producing Ratrons. The more delicately made, the higher their efficiency.
A facility for manufacturing various parts. Requires a lot of resources and time. Best to assign skilled citizens.
A facility that produces research points using electricity. Yields research results faster than standard labs.
A hangar for readying drones. When set orders are issued nearby, drones are deployed.
A structure that produces electricity using Ratizens. A basic power device, not very efficient.
A structure for issuing commands to distant facilities via radio waves. No need to rely on Mailbox anymore.
A facility that uses electricity to incinerate anything. Can continuously burn whatever is placed inside.
A trap that chains electricity to approaching enemies. Shocks all it touches, but weakens over distance.
A workbench for researching various engineering facilities. Engineering projects require a lot of research points.
A facility for precision circuit work. Through this, the city advances further into the future.
A facility used for storing or supplying electricity. Has a smaller charge capacity relative to its size.
A sturdy wall made of iron plates. Electricity does not flow through it, so it's safe to use.
An explosive mine that damages nearby targets. Be careful not to ensnare allies.
A mine that stuns nearby targets with a shock. Be careful not to ensnare allies.
Top part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
A hot wall made of clumped ashes with embers not yet fully extinguished. Walking over it is just asking for burns.
An electrically powered toilet that's a level cleaner. It's so convenient, it feels like a quality of life improvement.
A structure that broadcasts videos through a Joy Box. The quality of programs varies greatly depending on the presenter!
A device that receives signals and plays video and sound. Shows entertaining videos, no matter the distance.
A trap that uses magnetic force to pull objects. Be careful not to get caught in the pulling force.
Generates electricity using the Earth's heat. Effective, though suitable locations are limited.
A structure for training the city's guardians. Their will to protect is strong and steadfast.
A sticky wall coated with slime. It's so tacky that moving over it becomes a real challenge.
A device that transfers water from one side to the other. Utilize it wherever water is needed.
A structure for recharging and repairing. The inclusion of repair functionality has reduced charging efficiency.
A luxurious bed decorated with golden beetles. It's even more plush, making it ideal for comfortable rest.
An ancient tomb made by old weasels. Are you ready to face any danger for the treasure?
Ancient ruins where treasures are said to be sleeping. Heavy insect wing beats are heard carried by the wind.
The treasure vault of a great old king. Somehow, the stored money increases.
A marker flag for deploying soldiers. Soldiers placed under one banner will charge simultaneously.
A structure to explore and survey the surroundings. What lurks beyond the borders?
Enemy command headquarters. Must be destroyed before our headquarters falls.
Our command headquarters. Must destroy the enemy command headquarters before ours falls.
A barbaric ladder made by lizards. Made from the bones and hides of their prey.
A facility to hire foreign soldiers or mercenaries. The hired soldiers guard the area around the campsite.
A facility to train unit beneficial to squads. Rats together Strong.

Shrine dedicated for sacred sheep.
By the power of sheep, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred horse.
By the power of horse, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred snake.
By the power of snake, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred rooster.
By the power of rooster, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred rabbit.
By the power of rabbit, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred monkey.
By the power of monkey, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred pig.
By the power of pig, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred tiger.
By the power of tiger, skill can be used.

Shrine dedicated for sacred dragon.
By the power of dragon, skill can be used.
A post for monitoring the labor of citizens. They may not be happy, but they will work harder.
A wall made of processed glass. Not very strong, but it lets light through beautifully.
A bench made of processed glass. Cool and slightly unstable, but beautiful.
A fountain made of processed glass. The sight of water flowing over the glass is beautiful.
A window with a wooden frame. A house without a single window is bound to be dark.
A window with a stone frame. A house without a single window is bound to be dark.
A streetlight made by melting glass and decorating it with metal. The light flows through the various colored glass beautifully.
A hot forge of unknown origin. It can imbue equipment with the powerful force of the volcanic region.
Top part of the Grand Monument. Build it to show the magnificent leadership.
A decorative item that provides a warm atmosphere indoors.
A decorative item that looks like it can hold various items.
A decorative item that looks like it can hold clothes.
A structure where special dishes can be prepared using royal secret recipes.
A structure where trading with visiting merchants can occur. A different merchant comes every day with new goods.
An electric station that launches faster elevators. Equipped with high-voltage lines to connect wires on both sides.
An old tunnel whose age is unknown. With minor repairs, it seems usable.
